sentences.english: You are a bit  scatty so you don't check names on payslips before opening them.
sentences.chinese: 你有点笨，所以才没核实工资单上的名字就打开看。

sentences.english: TCCC must have the right to verify the copy with the inspecting company.
sentences.chinese: TCCC公司有权与审核机构进行核实报告的真实性。

sentences.english: According to the regulations of Ministry of Education, hourly payment is based on the actual teaching hours.
sentences.chinese: 授课钟点费依教育部规定按实际授课时数核实支给。

sentences.english: There have only ever been 106 verified supercentenarians in the UK.
sentences.chinese: 在英国也只有106位已核实的超级百岁老人。

sentences.english: Check with your school about whether it has a sealant program.
sentences.chinese: 核实你的学校是否有提供保护胶的计划。

sentences.english: However, it is difficult to verify where the information about the source of various products and product parts is coming from.
sentences.chinese: 但是很难核实多种产品和配件产品信息的来源。

sentences.english: To verify the order and completeness of(the pages of a volume).
sentences.chinese: 我查了好多书来核实这一点。

sentences.english: Don’t become cynical, but verify everything you can. The lesson learned: make sure you know who it is you’re dealing with and what their motives may be.
sentences.chinese: 不要愤世嫉俗，但是近你所能核实一切。
他说的话需要调查核实。

sentences.english: Of course, you can’t check everything out yourself.
sentences.chinese: 当然，你无法完全核实你自己写的所有东西。

sentences.english: But he says the North must still agree to a verification process.
sentences.chinese: 但是他说，北韩必须要接受一个核实程序。

sentences.english: You have no database of root certificates, so this certificate cannot be validated.
sentences.chinese: 这张证书是自签的，无法自动进行核实。

sentences.english: Why does the Assistant Manager need to check the pigeon whole?
sentences.chinese: 为什么大堂副理需要核实整个文件架？

sentences.english: Instrumentation on the target verified that the surrogate high-energy laser hit the target.
sentences.chinese: 目标导弹上的仪器核实替代高能激光准确命中目标。

sentences.english: An accuracy check is the first level of copy-editing.
sentences.chinese: 核实报道的准确性是文字编辑的第一项工作。

sentences.english: Passengers show credit card for verification purposes.
sentences.chinese: 乘客须出示信用咭以便核实。

definition: to report to one's superiors/to appear in the news/to reply to a letter
to check/to inquire/to consult (a document etc)/inquiry/query
to investigate and find out/to ascertain
investigation/inquiry/to investigate/to survey/survey/(opinion) poll/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
to screen/to discriminate/to reexamine a case/screening (of applicants etc)
